name: Blue Label Labs
tag_list: mobile, mobile-applications, bahndr, klink, travelwallet, mobile-developers, ios-developer, android-developer, windows-developer, nyc-ios-developer
overview:
Blue Label Labs is a New York and Seattle based iOS, Android and Windows Phone mobile development lab. We build apps!

In addition to developing our own mobile applications, we offer design, engineering, and implementation services to other mobile application developers. Our goal is to build interesting and unique concepts for the mobile generation; a place where beautiful software is developed the right way.

To date, Blue Label has released mobile applications for the Android, Windows Phone and iOS platforms. Blue Label’s portfolio includes:

  • Bahndr (iOS)
  • Dani’s List (iOS)
  • TravelWallet (WP7)
  • Klink (Android)

Our passion is mobile app development. Not only does Blue Label support and enable the mobile first visions of many startup and established companies, we’ve also created and maintain a suite of resources designed to make mobile development more accessible to non-technical audiences. These include:

Our Blog – IdeaToAppster.com A web resource developed to help would-be mobile app entrepreneurs turn their ideas into real apps. Visit www.ideatoappster.com.

Our Book – Appsters: The Beginner’s Guide to App Entrepreneurship A recently published book written to give aspiring app entrepreneurs an end-to-end guide to launching their own app. Written for a non-technical audience, Appsters breaks through the technical jargon to give an easy-to-read, comprehensive and entertaining look at starting up an app. Visit http://www.ideatoappster.com/book.

At Blue Label, we leverage a wide-range of technologies to create our apps: Objective-C/Cocoa, JAVA/Android SDK, WinRT, C# / .NET 4.0, ASP.NET MVC, Javascript/JQuery, Wordpress, and more.
